name: jwt-auth-kit
description: JWTGuard is a robust Node.js authentication package designed to simplify and enhance the security of your application. Built with JSON Web Tokens (JWT), it offers a comprehensive solution for managing user authentication, role-based access control (RBAC), refresh tokens, token blacklisting, and secure password hashing. Whether you're building an admin panel or a user management system, JWTGuard provides the essential tools for safeguarding your application while offering a seamless user experience.
author: Deepak Chaudhary
